title: Stepstowealth
author: Stepstowealth
content: Is it the game you started playing as a gambler that you still play till now? Is there any gambler in this place who was used to playing a particular game before but never was successful winning or did not win enough and then made up their mind that it was time for a change in the game you gamble on. Which game did you change from, and what did you change to? how long did you play the game that you are deciding to stop playing because of the bad outcomes?

comments.author: Hirose UK
comments.body: If we talk about my playing experience the first time entered an online casino with a crypto base was slots and from there I had several first wins with amounts that were quite satisfying for me when could still be called beginner.Currently I am sure that slots are still one of the most popular games and have many fans even though they don't necessarily get wins or profits but they still come back to play again.After all not all gamblers only like one game and when one game cannot make a profit they will move to another game and try their luck in a different game.After slots I tried roulette and poker as games that might be quite fun to play when have lost from slots but poker is the main thing because there are several skills that must be used to win.Until now the only things I still have tried several times are slots and poker but roulette after realizing that it really does waste money quickly has and I chosen to abandon the roulette game.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I started out with soccer games but then decided to try my hand at casino games. I'm basically the type of person that believes in trying out so many options so my decision was not because I lost so much in sports, although switching to another type of sports betting was a bit hard especially as I couldn't relate with casino games as the beginning. What I believe is gambling is a thing of chance and some feel a sport is not favorable and when they switch to another, that fetches them winnings, they then believe the first sport was not for them. Nah, I think every sport has its winning days, and it's not tied to only one.

comments.body: Initially I was attracted to betting on tennis and soccer and I was making profit though I also encountered several losses due to some unforeseen defeats from some teams that was picked but losing a huge amount in tennis I made up my mind to focus on soccer gambling (football) alone for now since it is the only type of gambling that I have recorded most of my big wins. Now to answer the question of the op on how long I didn't win before stopping a particular game to move to another one, I think in my days of playing tennis, my target is to always record a win at least twice or thrice in a month but I lost in a whole month and the last amount I staked that I lost made me to stop doing anything that has to do with tennis.On the football betting, it's one of the gambling I started off with aside tennis and am still enjoying soccer betting till date because they amount I have won is far bigger than the amount I have used to gamble and since my aim of gambling is to make profit I decided to stick to what works for me and soccer gambling has been amazing since the very beginning.

comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on September 28, 2023, 03:40:09 PMIs it the game you started playing as a gambler that you still play till now? Started to play seriously with poker, but then pandemia hit, and i had to play online. It wasn't as fun and i kept making mistakes because of frustration. Then i went to slots, made some money and got exited about those. They were way cooler than physical slots i used to play when i was younger. And the jackpots were way higher, even though they were most likely impossible to get, they were there.So while i was making money on and of and naturally at some point i made more losses. But it took a lot of money to find something else. So i tried betting sports. Turns out it's more boring then i would like it to be, unless i am betting on something i know about and watch that on tv. But i am not that into sports that i would like to watch them for hours to know the score. I might make some money with sports but i am really not so into that.So i came back to slots and house games. This time just for fun and winning is a nice bonus. But i am not in any way counting on winning. I play with smaller bets and i have a system and a budget so i won't spend more than i afford.If i get bored to this i'll find somehing else again. Maybe i'll go back to poker tournaments now that pandemic is over. Those just take so much of my time.

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.body: Is what you are asking about all types of gambling games? If yes, there is actually a lot to share based on experience. the first, is Baccarat. This game is more tense than any game IMO. I even spent the contents of the savings I collected in one year. This type of game is very simple and you don't need to wait long to win. just like blackjack, roulette and several other games. however, of all the ones I like that are luck based are Bacarrat. It cannot be denied that I have won large amounts in just a short time. As usual, the Martingale technique has always been very popular. at the point I lost what I had built for a year, finally completely quit gambling within a few years.Another experience, I like playing slots. If there is a game that I like more, I will play it until I get bored, whether I win or lose. However, at certain points, I have to save more financially because of my responsibility for my family's needs.Now, I just play as casually as I can. I like football betting more because apart from other types of gambling, I have also liked football for a long time, this bet gives me more chances of winning than losing. at least, it can minimize losses.

comments.body: I have pretty much been playing the same games as since I was a kid ( obviously as a child I was playing games but never actually betting with real money).  Every once in a while a new game will pop up, for example Texas Hold'em because MASSIVE when I was in college and it's all we played.  I mean we had a game going every single night between just one of our apartment complexes.  Otherwise, I'm a creature of habit and tend to play the same games/bet the same sports.
